metadata.title: CVE-2023-23606 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 108. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 109.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
